row.name: Ones
row.description: Sum of ones in a throw

row.name: Twos
row.description: Sum of twos in a throw

row.name: Threes
row.description: Sum of threes in a throw

row.name: Fours
row.description: Sum of fours in a throw

row.name: Fives
row.description: Sum of fives in a throw

row.name: Sixes
row.description: Sum of sixes in a throw

row.name: Bonus 1
row.description: 30 points if Sum of the above rows (Ones to Sixes) is greater than 62, 0 otherwise

row.name: Three of a kind
row.description: Sum of dices if they contain 3 dices of the same value, 0 otherwise

row.name: Four of a kind
row.description: Sum of dices if they contain 4 dices of the same value, 0 otherwise

row.name: Full house
row.description: 20 points for 3 matching dices and another 2 matching dices, 0 otherwise

row.name: Small straight
row.description: 30 points for at least 4 dices of sequential rank, 0 otherwise

row.name: Large straight
row.description: 40 points for 5 dices of sequential rank, 0 otherwise

row.name: Bonus 2
row.description: 100 points for every Five of a kind after the first one
